Posts.Content: I have tried to contact them but they don't get back to me and it's less than 2 weeks already so tempted to stop now.
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and surgery

Posts.Content: I know I'm so jealous of ladies who have really supportive bc nurses. I rarely contact them but when I do they never get back to me. I spoke to his secretary today - she said he was at the breast unit today so couldn't ask him until Friday! surely she could have just sent an email!  Thanks for your advice
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and surgery

Posts.Content: Hi I am due to have asymmetry correction surgery on 14th March. Does anyone know if I should stop taking tamoxifen before the operation to reduce the risk of dvt? I've tried seeking advice from breast unit but they haven't called me back and the pharmacist at my GP had no idea! Thanks Jan xx
